tool_description: Api that converts gold price to choosen by IBAN currency for 1 gram and 1 ounce for choosen date.
name: Gold To Currency
title: Gold To Currency

api_list.name: Get Gold Price

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Please note that gold is not priced on weekends

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gold-to-currency.p.rapidapi.com/gold/2020-01-20/usd"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gold-to-currency.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gold-to-currency.p.rapidapi.com/gold/{date}/{iban}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gold-to-currency.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
